Posts.Content: Jun 6, 2008 09:40PM debap wrote: Amy:  I know exactly how you feel.  My son (then 3 years old) was diagnosed with AML (leukemia) in 2003 and had to have a bone marrow transplant.  My husband was diagnosed with renal cell carcinoma in 2004 and our son relapsed two weeks later (a 2nd transplant).  I was diagnosed with BC in Dec. 2007.  My husband lost his mom last month to colon cancer and his father was diagnosed 2 weeks ago with stage 4 liver cancer.  ENOUGH!  Actually, we feel blessed that we are here and doing fine.  We just redefine normal and hope that we have put in our time and things will be smooth sailing for a while. You and your family are in my prayers, Debbie
Posts.Title: I can't be the only one, can I? Hubby & I both Stage IV arc229 jinan22
